Yarden, Shire ha-ḳodesh le-Rabi Shemuʹel Ibn Gabirol / Dov Yarden [ed.]. Jerusalem, 1971-1973, p. 432-435, ll. 219-262),;Compared to the common edition, here the order of some strophes is inverted (ll. 219-222; 239-240).
